page.title: 13Life Style Near Goonhavern
page.content: Ours is a rural district with small villages scattered throughout. Life here, I think can be described as tranquil but may be regarded as slow compared wth town life.A number of residents are inter related and nearly everbody knows everbody else .There is a strong community spirit and overall , people care for one another.Respect is shown to elders whose opions are valued.Children are expected to be well mannered and to conform to an expected standard of behavior.A lot of importance is attached to education and academic attainment.Similarly success in physical achievements is sought after. There is atendancy to distrust new ideas and to prefer traditoinal tried and tested routines but modern,up to date gadgets are present in most homes.
